ing: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as desired
1 tablespoon flax seed, or to taste (optional)
des: "This quick smoothie provides a full day's serving suggestion of fruits and vegetables! If you share the smoothie you'll still get 50% in before your day even starts."
ins: Blend spinach, strawberries, cucumber, carrots, banana, apple, water, ice cubes, and flax seed together in a blender until smooth.
